english.segment1: Here's a thought, if you're willing to listen. I only tell the truth of the feelings I'm given
english.segment2: Can you hear me now? Listen. Whispers in the rain. Listen. Don't push love away, you know you do. It's all we have
english.segment3: It's a chore holding onto a vision. Don't leave her high and dry. She's the one you'll be missing
english.segment4: Can you hear me now? Listen. Whispers in the rain, while you're awake. Don't push love away, you know you do. It's all we have
english.segment5: I hate to think hesitation is a burden. A bittersweet design for a lesson you're learning
english.segment6: Can you hear me now. Listen. Whispers in the rain while you're awake. Don't push love away, you know you do, it's all we have
english.segment8: Can you feel me now this time?. Whispers in the rain, lying awake. Don't push love away, you know you do. It's all you have
english.segment9: Can you hear me now listen. whispers in the rain while your awake. Don't push love away, you know you do. It's all we have. Here's a thought, if you're willing to listen
